doc.title: Export
doc.section:
Exports a clean directory tree.
Description
Export a clean directory tree from the repository specified by URL into PATH at revision REV if it is given, otherwise at HEAD. If PATH is omitted, the last component of the URL is used for the local directory name.
By specifying PATH1 and PATH2, a clean directory tree from the working copy specified by PATH1 is exported into PATH2. All local changes will be preserved, but files not under revision control will not be copied.
Changes
Local disk.
